summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Director of Engineering to execute agreements with the Washington State Department of Transportation, the Port of Seattle, the Burlington Northern Railroad, King County and the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle for reimbursement of a portion of City costs relating to the South Downtown Transportation Study project; authorizing the acceptance, deposit and appropriation of the funds when received; authorizing the hiring of consultants; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Transportation Fund therefor.
